Limited budget: The cost of eco-friendly wedding materials and services may be higher than traditional options, making it difficult to stay within the budget.
Clashing values: The bride and groom may have different views on eco-friendliness, leading to disagreements and stress during the planning process.

Limited availability of eco-friendly vendors: Finding vendors who specialize in eco-friendly wedding services and products may be challenging, leading to delays and compromises in the planning process.
Guest expectations: Some guests may not be familiar with eco-friendly practices and may feel uncomfortable with the unique approaches taken during the wedding.
Time constraints: With the many details involved in wedding planning, it may be difficult to find time to research and implement eco-friendly practices, leading to a lack of attention to detail.
